status.name: ALREADY_THERE
status.text: Node is already in the tree

status.name: BOTH_OFF
status.text: Both this node and its parent are off

status.name: CONGLOM_NOT_FULL
status.text: Current conglomerate is not yet full

status.name: EDITTING
status.text: Tree file open for edit: operation not permitted

status.name: ILLEGAL_ITEM
status.text: Invalid item code or part number specified

status.name: ILLPAGCNT
status.text: Illegal page count, error mapping tree file

status.name: INVDFFCLASS
status.text: Invalid data fmt: only CLASS_S can have data in NCI

status.name: INVDTPUSG
status.text: Attempt to store datatype which conflicts with the designated usage of this node

status.name: INVRECTYP
status.text: Record type invalid for requested operation

status.name: MAXOPENEDIT
status.text: Too many files open for edit

status.name: NODATA
status.text: No data available for this node

status.name: NODNAMLEN
status.text: Node name too long (12 chars max)

status.name: NOEDIT
status.text: Tree file is not open for edit

status.name: NOMETHOD
status.text: Method not available for this object

status.name: NOTALLSUBS
status.text: Main tree opened but not all subtrees found/or connected

status.name: NOTCHILDLESS
status.text: Node must be childless to become subtree reference

status.name: NOT_IN_LIST
status.text: Tree being opened was not in the list

status.name: NOTMEMBERLESS
status.text: Subtree reference can not have members

status.name: NOTSON
status.text: Subtree reference cannot be a member

status.name: NOT_CONGLOM
status.text: Head node of conglomerate does not contain a DTYPE_CONGLOM record

status.name: NOWRITEMODEL
status.text: Data for this node can not be written into the MODEL file

status.name: NOWRITESHOT
status.text: Data for this node can not be written into the SHOT file

status.name: NO_CONTEXT
status.text: There is no active search to end

status.name: PARENT_OFF
status.text: Parent of this node is OFF

status.name: READONLY
status.text: Tree was opened with readonly access

status.name: UNRESOLVED
status.text: Not an indirect node reference: No action taken

status.name: UNSUPARRDTYPE
status.text: Complex data types not supported as members of arrays

status.name: WRITEFIRST
status.text: Tree has been modified: write or quit first

status.name: LOCK_FAILURE
status.text: Error locking file, perhaps NFSLOCKING not enabled on this system

status.name: NOSEGMENTS
status.text: No segments exist in this node

status.name: INVSHAPE
status.text: Invalid shape for this data segment

status.name: INVSHOT
status.text: Invalid shot number - must be -1 (model), 0 (current), or Positive

status.name: INVTAG
status.text: Invalid tagname - must begin with alpha followed by 0-22 alphanumeric or underscores

status.name: NOPATH
status.text: No 'treename'_path environment variable defined. Cannot locate tree files.

status.name: TREEFILEREADERR
status.text: Error reading in tree file contents.

status.name: NOCURRENT
status.text: No current shot number set for this tree.

status.name: NCIWRITE
status.text: Error writing node characterisitics to file.

status.name: NCIREAD
status.text: Error reading node characteristics from file.

status.name: MOVEERROR
status.text: Error replacing original treefile with new one.

status.name: OPENEDITERR
status.text: Error reopening new treefile for write access.

status.name: READONLY_TREE
status.text: Tree is marked as readonly. No write operations permitted.
